title: BetAfalagi
description: Founder and full stack engineer working on BetAfalagi telegram bot. BetAfalagi bot aims to make it easier to connect people on the lookout for houses with house owners who want to sell/rent their homes.

title: HuluSira
description: I'm currently founder and full stack developer on hulusira.com. HuluSira is a job board platform for job seekers based in Ethiopia.

title: Langbot(now Botter)

title: Zena

title: Tenegna
